resources.string: Write a function named printMatrix, that takes an array of integers representing a 2d square matrix and the number of elements on each side as parameters. This function should start at the upper left hand corner of the matrix and print each element in a counterclockwise spiral
Enter array of integers, divided by spaces
Array element requirement: 0 <= a ∈ m <= 2^31–1 \n lines counter requirement: 1 <= n <= 2^15
